messages.content: Solve this riddle: "A house full of people without windows and doors."
The answer to the riddle is "A mushroom."
Can you pleas elaborate your answer further.

Sure! The answer to the riddle is a mushroom. A mushroom is a type of fungus that grows in dark, damp places, such as in the woods or in caves. It can often be found in a group or cluster, giving the appearance of a "house full of people." Also, mushrooms don't have windows and doors, since they are not a man-made structure.
